author: craigmcc
msg: [38050] Re-implementation of Shale remoting support
Inspired by the referenced RFE, which asks for an easier way to map URLs to
business logic without requiring explicit configuration for each one, plus
having written some components that want to request static resources without
making the application developer explicitly place these files in the webapp
document root, this checkin contains a new "org.apache.shale.remoting" package
(with unit tests) that will, when fleshed out a bit more, replace the existing
support in "org.apache.shale.remote".
Until the web site documentation has been updated, grab a nightly build that
contains these classes (20060103 or later) and look at the package overview
page for the "org.apache.shale.remoting" package.
Next steps will be to add at least one more concrete Processor implementation
(to execute a Commons Chain command or chain like the old remote support),
add use cases and tests to the example application, and migrate the existing
use cases to the new APIs.
